data.Name: The Guilty Pleasures
data.Bio: The Guilty Pleasures are a punk band from Lancaster, England. Influenced by bands such as Anti-Flag and The Unseen. They have released two E.P's entitled, 'Freedom of Speech' and, 'Think of England' on the 29th of June 2008 they released a full length CD called , 'What Are We Fighting For?'. They have also shared the stage with acts such as MC Lars, Subhumans and UK Subs. Recently they have been getting radio play on Mike Davies' Radio 1 Punk Show and they got a KKKK album review in Kerrang magazine (KKKKK being the highest possible rating). Read more on Last.fm
